name: Spooky Ghost (everyyy)
description:
Spooky Ghost is an early game prototype that I created for fun and youtube content.

You are a tiny ghost, your goal is to dodge obstacles and survive as long as possible to accumulate the highest score!

--------------------------------------------

The rules 

USE W and S or Up and Down to move your character
